channel.title: [PI] Pendemonium [PI]
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i584.photobucket.com/albums/ss285/Nightmare97/Untitled-2-2.jpg[/img]
Hey! So Ive been taking a HUGE break from coding and RSPS and I have had the desire to make a new project, and actually follow through with it. Now I have done a project before, and it was great at the start! But then I found other stuff to do and left it. But I promised myself that this project will have alot of potential, the most active staff I can get, and be a kick ass game.
So basically its going to be a [PI] base. Its going to be a legitimate server were when you play it, it wont get old. How am I going to do this? By adding [b]at least[/b] 1 new feature every week. There will also be limited time quests and rewards in order to let characters have their own unique equipment. I am also adding a custom side quest-line which will need much ideas to make. And these ideas will come from the team I am trying to recruit right now!
Let me start off with some features I will be putting into the game
- Custom Achievements to be earned - PvP point System - A Unique Home - A Pk Box - Clue Scrolls - [b]WEBCLIENT[/b] - Legit PvP experience - Reasonable Commands - Vote Point System - Custom Minigames - Custom Quests - Much Much More!
Now there is alot of stuff that needs to be done and many roles to be played. Which is were [b]you[/b] come in.
Here is the team roster -
[ul][*]Coder - Acrodox [*] Hoster - Acrodox (VPS soon) [*] [b]Website Developer[/b] - marcbob [*] [b]Forum and Game Moderator[/b] - OmgItsShane [*] Beta Tester 1 - (SPOT OPEN) [*] Beta Tester 2 - (SPOT OPEN) [*] GFX Designer (logos and stuff) - (SPOT OPEN) [*] [b]WEBCLIENT MAKER (URGENT NEED)[/b] - ExtremeX-Scape™[/ul]
The ones bolded are needed Asap. But all roles are significantly needed.
Please Fill out The application like the form below:
[Quote] Role I Am Applying For* - Why I should be picked* - Years of experience* - Work of mine - MSN* - [/quote]
Thank you so much! [b]THREAD WILL HAVE IN-GAME PICTURES ASAP.[/b][/center]
Unique home and Webclient, PM me if you want link:
[IMG]http://i584.photobucket.com/albums/ss285/Nightmare97/Untitled-4.png[/img]
Fullscreen:
[IMG]http://i584.photobucket.com/albums/ss285/Nightmare97/Untitled-5.png[/img]

Work of mine - I will pick one of my most recent. (DemonWars Website = http://demonwars.0fees.net/
MSN - Pick either (jamesterjames@hotmail.com or ve3xje@gmail.com)[/center][/quote]

item.dc:creator: @oldskoolpk oldskoolpk
item.description:
@oldskoolpk wrote:

You guys are ridiculous. Making a transparent GFX is 2 simple steps.
1 - Select “Transparent” option
2 - Save as a .PNG

This works for photoshop.

OT: Could I please added to list?

Honestly, I can create GFX’s for you of any type. All I need is information on how you wanted it to be added.

1 - I could make better GFX’s for your private server, the one that was designed is very simple and there are around 4 layers. All he did was simple.

2 - Mind looking through my application and giving me a response, please?

If you can make a good " I support Rampage X" Banner then Ill accept you. Make it average forum signature sized. Use your best judgment.
[/quote]

I had no idea what you meant by “average forum size”

Here is a quick tab I’ve created.[/quote]

accepted

Gfx John:

Hold up first that wasn’t just 4 layers it was 8 layers -,- seconded he already accepted me so back off plus i already made the banner for them

john it doesnt hurt to have two different gfx, i could use one for the server pic and one for the website.
